summary.span: 显示图像并对图像上的鼠标单击作出响应的控件。

span.span: A control that displays an image and responds to mouse clicks on the image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [确定用户单击的位置Determining Where the User Clicked](#DeterminingWhereTheUserClicked) - [ImageButton 控件和验证ImageButton Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件来显示响应鼠标单击的图像。Use the control to display an image that responds to mouse clicks. 同时并会引发事件时单击控件。Both the and events are raised when the control is clicked. 可以使用事件处理程序以使控件的行为类似命令按钮。You can use the event handler to make the control behave like a Command button. 命令名可以通过使用与控件关联属性。A command name can be associated with the control by using the property. 这允许多个控件放置在同一网页上。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the same Web page. 值中，属性可以然后以编程方式标识事件处理程序以确定适当的操作执行时每个单击控件。The value of the property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 属性还可用于传递有关该命令，例如，指定按升序排列的其他信息。The property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order. 使用控件是类似于使用 ASP.NET控件。Using the control is similar to using the ASP.NET control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[按钮 Web 服务器控件内容映射](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66b3ce28-3b93-4f0a-951f-42fb5bb5fddf)。For more information, see [Button Web Server Controls Content Map](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66b3ce28-3b93-4f0a-951f-42fb5bb5fddf). 和类概述控件。and the class overview for the control. ## 确定用户单击的位置Determining Where the User Clicked 通过使用事件处理程序，可以以编程方式确定单击的图像的坐标。By using the event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked. 您可以进行编码的响应，基于坐标的值。You can then code a response, based on the values of the coordinates. 请注意，位于图像的左上角原点 （0，0）。Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image. ## ImageButton 控件和验证ImageButton Controls and Validation 默认情况下执行页验证时单击控件。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件关联。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 若要防止发生页验证，请设置属性设置为`false`。To prevent page validation from occurring, set the property to `false`. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 包含源代码的 Visual Studio Web 站点项目是可随附于本主题：[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192874)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192874). 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件，用于显示图像被单击位置的坐标。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that displays the coordinates at which an image is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下执行页验证时单击控件。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件关联。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时通过单击控件属性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性设置为`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 此属性通常设置为`false`重置或清除按钮，以防止在单击按钮时执行验证。This property is commonly set to `false` for a Reset or Clear button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 时的值属性设置为`true`，还可以使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件引发验证。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以防止发生页验证。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意如何方法单独激活每个验证的控件。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定要执行时的命令单击控件，如`Sort`， `Cancel`，或`Edit`。Use this property to specify the command to perform when the control is clicked, such as `Sort`, `Cancel`, or `Edit`. 这允许多个控件放置在同一网页上。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the same Web page. 在中，此属性中的值可以然后以编程方式标识事件处理程序以确定适当的操作执行时每个单击控件。The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 可以通过使用包含该命令，例如，指定升序排序顺序，有关补充信息属性。Supplemental information about the command, such as specifying ascending sort order, can be included by using the property. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用要关联命令名与属性控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to associate a command name with an control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否可通过单击执行回发到服务器。Use the property to specify whether an can be clicked to perform a post back to the server. 如果此属性设置为`false`，该控件会呈现在页上，但不会引发回发事件时单击。If you set this property to `false`, the control renders on the page, but does not raise a post back event when clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 页包含两个控件。The page contains two controls. 属性设置为`true`为`EnabledImageButton`图像按钮，从而导致回发到服务器时单击。The property is set to `true` for the `EnabledImageButton` image button, causing it to post back to the server when clicked. 属性设置为`false`为`NotEnabledImageButton`图像按钮，使其呈现在页上，但不是回发到服务器时单击。The property is set to `false` for the `NotEnabledImageButton` image button, causing it to render on the page, but not post back to the server when clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下控件呈现属性使用`alt`属性。By default, the control renders the property using an `alt` attribute. 当未设置属性，控件不包括`alt`特性以指定在控件呈现替换文字。When the property is not set, the control does not include the `alt` attribute to specify the alternate-text in the control rendering. XHTML 文档类型定义需要`alt`上图像控件的属性。The XHTML document type definition requires the `alt` attribute on image controls. 但是，辅助功能最佳做法建议并不意味着 Web 页的上下文相关的信息的图像控件不应指定`alt`属性。However, accessibility best practices recommend that image controls that do not convey information relevant to the context of the Web page should not specify an `alt` attribute. 可以通过设置符合 XHTML 和可访问性要求属性设置为`true`。You can meet both XHTML and accessibility requirements by setting the property to `true`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象，表示控件的回发的行为。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 对象通常然后传递给方法，用于获取的客户端脚本函数的引用，调用时，会导致服务器回发到页。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to postback to the page. 扩展时，使用此方法主要由控件开发人员类。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

para.span: 您可以重写修改 button 控件的回发选项，或单击该按钮时调用客户端脚本在派生类中的方法。

span.span: You can override the method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.

para.span: 请务必调用基类的方法，以便回发的标准选项设置。

span.span: Be sure to call the base class's method so that the standard postback options are set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 通过使用事件处理程序，可以以编程方式确定单击的图像的坐标。By using the event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked. 您可以进行编码的响应，这些坐标的值。You can then code a response, based on the values of these coordinates. 请注意，位于图像的左上角原点 （0，0）。Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件，以显示当用户单击该图像的坐标。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the coordinates where the user clicks the image. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 事件处理程序用于使控件的行为类似命令按钮。The event handler is used to make the control behave like a Command button. 命令名可以通过使用与控件关联属性。A command name can be associated with the control by using the property. 这允许多个控件放置在网页上。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the Web page. 在中，此属性中的值可以然后以编程方式标识事件处理程序以确定适当的操作执行时每个单击控件。The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 属性还可用于传递有关该命令，例如，指定按升序排列的其他信息。The property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order. > [!NOTE] > 的控件层次结构中的窗体通过引发事件`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件确定哪些单击控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示将页回发到自身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够跨页后使用控件。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. 设置属性设置为 Web 页的 URL 时要发送到单击控件。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定`Page2.aspx`包含的页将导致控制要发布到`Page2.aspx`。For example, specifying `Page2.aspx` causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果未指定的值属性，页面回发到自身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在执行与服务器端验证的控件跨页回发时，应检查的页属性是`true`之前处理回发。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 对于跨页回发时，要检查的页面是 PreviousPage。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the PreviousPage. 下面的 Visual Basic 代码演示如何做到这一点：The following Visual Basic code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 有关跨页面张贴的技术的详细信息，请参阅[跨页面发送在 ASP.NET Web 窗体](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性执行跨页面发送。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 当用户单击控件，页面发到指定的目标页的文本框中输入的值属性。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要运行此示例，您还必须在此代码示例所在的同一目录中创建目标页的文件。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 目标页的代码在下一步的示例中提供。The code for the target page is provided in the next example. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/imagebutton.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/imagebutton.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问已发布的值从另一个页面使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此页获取前一页从发布并为用户显示的字符串。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果尝试直接运行此代码示例，则将会出现错误，因为值`Text`字段将为`null`。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `Text` field will be `null`. 相反，使用此代码创建一个目标页面并将该文件放在与上一示例的代码相同的目录。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 文件的名称必须对应于指定的值上一示例中的属性。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 对于上面的示例代码运行时，此页将在发生跨页面发送时自动执行。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross-page post occurs. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2/CS/imagebutton.postbackurlpage2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2/VB/imagebutton.postbackurlpage2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示如何 ASP.NET 应呈现 HTML 控件的控件处于禁用状态时。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 会将`disabled`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 会将`class`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的自定义从类时，使用属性主要由控件开发人员控件。The property is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. 使用属性来确定与关联的值控件。Use the property to determine the value associated with an control. 此属性重写基实现始终返回`HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`。This property overrides the base implementation to always return `HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写中自定义方法控件，以便它始终返回输入标记。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom control so that it always returns an Input tag. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 代码示例的第一个部分必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。The first part of the code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 第二个部分必须在.cs 文件 （适用于 C# 中) 或 （对于 Visual Basic) 为.vb 文件中。The second part must be in a .cs file (for C#) or a .vb file (for Visual Basic). Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组可以分配给特定类别的页面上的验证控件。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性指定的验证组的名称为其控件回发到服务器时导致验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 指定的值时属性，只是指定组的一部分的验证控件的验证时控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果不指定此属性的值和属性设置为`true`，页面上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件时该控件回发到服务器进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要验证时的控件控件回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 页包含三个用于捕获用户数据的文本框和三个控制措施来确保用户未将一个文本框留空。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制在前两个文本框中为`PersonalInfoGroup`验证组并控制第三个文本框处于`LocationInfoGroup`验证组。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. 当`ImageButton1`单击时，仅验证组中的控件`PersonalInfoGroup`进行验证。When `ImageButton1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. 当`ImageButton2`单击时，仅验证组中的控件`LocationInfoGroup`进行验证。When `ImageButton2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.ValidationGroup/CS/imagebutton.validationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.ValidationGroup/VB/imagebutton.validationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
